snippet: Unemployment fell in 29 states in August and held steady in 11, but falling oil and coal prices continued to take a toll on energy-producing states.
abstract: Labor Department reports unemployment fell in 29 states in August and remained same in 11 as hiring steadily continues to grow.
lead_paragraph: Unemployment fell in 29 states in August and held steady in 11, but falling oil and coal prices continued to take a toll on energy-producing states.

headline.main: Labor Market Steadies as Jobless Rate Falls in 29 States
headline.print_headline: Labor Market Steadies as Jobless Rate Falls in 29 States
